body:
Hello, rezbla here.

 soon i will be leaving avicus.

School is right around the corner, and I've been so distracted by avicus, that in a month, school, starts, and im not even ready. (Summer reading, etc...)

I will be playing less. But i will still be on the forums, and skype. (rezbla)

But in one month, im probably gone, for a while.

Ill be back dont worry!

Just a short reminder.

Thanks. 
rezbla <3

title: Its almost time.

replies.body:
It's great that you are dedicating time to your studies.
Good luck in school!
replies.body_tagged:
It's great that you are dedicating time to your studies.
Good luck in school!

replies.body: I don't know why everyone leaves during the school year.. I get that you might be busy and want to focus on your work, ect, but I have hockey practice everyday during the school year, along with homework, and I can still find a spare hour or two most days to come on. Anyways just saying if you like Avicus enough you can keep playing during the school year with a bit of time management.

replies.body: omg people leaving left and right :'(
replies.body_tagged: omg people leaving left and right :'(

replies.body: Could be real life situations that happen, and school just adds more stress. So minecraft shouldn't be a focus during a time like that. But, I'm not sure. All I know is that I ld like to wish you goodbye, and that it's been a pleasure having you here. <3

replies.body:
School's gonna be tough, but I think I can manage.

Good luck rez! I look forward to seeing you occasionally :P

replies.body: Leaving posts are no longer allowed on the Avicus Network. Instructed to lock them, sorry.
